main event: A UFO sighting was reported by a civilian pilot near Miami, Florida, on December 31, 1953, involving an unidentified object with a light attached to it. The pilot described the object as appearing airborne and maintaining a constant altitude before disappearing to the right rear of the aircraft.
interesting points: The UFO sighting involved a civilian pilot and was observed for a duration of 5 minutes at night.
The object appeared as a white light and was associated with a light, with the observer unable to distinguish further details.
The UFO was observed to veer right upon the aircraft's approach, and the light attached to it went out for 5 to 8 seconds before veering left and disappearing behind the aircraft.
The document contains detailed information about the weather and wind conditions at the time and place of the sighting, including visibility and cloud cover.
